trans-unit.source: Represents a single tab page in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的单个选项卡页<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls represent the tabbed pages in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 控件表示中的选项卡式的页<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection reflects the order of tabs in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的选项卡页的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合会反映在选项卡的顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改控件中的选项卡的顺序，必须通过删除它们，并将它们插入到新索引处更改它们在集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: TabPage controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class will have no effect, including <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 控件都受其容器，因此的某些属性继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基的类将具有不起作用，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The tabs in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> but not parts of the individual TabPage controls.
trans-unit.target: 中的选项卡<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>属于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>但不是包括单独的 TabPage 控件的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: Members of the TabPage class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: TabPage 的成员类，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>属性，会影响的客户端矩形将选项卡页，但不是制表符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the TabPage will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: 此外， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>TabPage 方法将隐藏选项卡。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the TabPage control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏选项卡上，你必须删除从 TabPage 控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage occur.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>TabPage 事件发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the TabPage do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的 TabPage 不发生事件时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形时，才。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how this control responds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods, see the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> members: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此控件如何响应的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法，请参阅以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>成员: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContainsFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanSelect%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Controls contained in a TabPage are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 显示选项卡页，并显示的选项卡页不会激活这些控件中的任何数据绑定时才会创建 TabPage 中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性使您可以指示是否应呈现选项卡页的背景，使用当前的视觉样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况仅当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>属性的父级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the background is painted normally.
trans-unit.target: 否则，通常绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> class and specifies the text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>类，并指定选项卡的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A> property is set to the value of the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>属性设置为的值`text`参数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text for the tab.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡的文本。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>属性和处理此事件以确定在值更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>属性不是对此控件有意义。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its size property
trans-unit.target: 控件增大根据需要在尽可能以适应其内容，但不会缩小至小于其大小属性的值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的背景色<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the BackColor property is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, in which case the default value of the BackColor property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 属性的默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>属性的父任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>的值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>，在其中用例 BackColor 属性的默认值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the BackColor value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 子控件，你将放置在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>继承默认情况下，背景颜色值，因此此行为会导致背景的子控件的当前的视觉样式呈现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the BackColor property automatically sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 更改 BackColor 属性的值将自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a BackColor value that you specify, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> property after you set the BackColor property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景以呈现使用可视样式，但你想继承一个 BackColor 值，你指定的子控件设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>属性之后再设置 BackColor 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示的背景色<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件的控件集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>分配给该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the DockChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理 DockChanged 事件，以检测更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the EnabledChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理 EnabledChanged 事件，以检测更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the tab page that contains the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 检索包含指定的对象的选项卡页。

trans-unit.source: The object to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> that contains the specified object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> ，其中包含指定的对象，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index to the image displayed on this tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此选项卡上显示的图像的索引。

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex points to an image in the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 指向关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A>图像

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index to the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that appears on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 中的图像的从零开始索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的选项卡上显示。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which signifies no image.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，表示没有图像。

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: ImageIndex 值是小于-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*> of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中的图像的键访问器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>的关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ImageList*>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey property specifies the image from the image list to display on the control.
trans-unit.target: ImageKey 属性指定要在控件上显示的图像列表中的映像。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: 表示的图像的键的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The x and y coordinates which specifies the location of the object.
trans-unit.target: X 和 y 坐标指定的对象的位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location*>

trans-unit.source: Although you can change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property and handle this event to determine when the value changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管您可以更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>属性和处理此事件以确定在值更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>属性不是对此控件有意义。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The upper limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: 下限大小的上限。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The lower limit of the size of the objet.
trans-unit.target: 较低的下限大小的限制。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形时，才。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnEnter method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnEnter 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，选项卡视为用于确定当选项卡页的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在早期版本的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>操作不会发生时焦点进入或离开选项卡上，但仅当焦点进入或离开的选项卡页的客户端矩形时，才。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnLeave method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnLeave 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制背景的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The system calls this method to paint the background of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: 系统调用此方法来绘制背景的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, this method paints the background using the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>的父属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>，此方法绘制使用当前的视觉样式的背景。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.UseVisualStyleBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method paints the background as usual.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法将像往常一样绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data useful for painting the background.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含数据用于绘制背景。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The size of a rectangular area into which the control can fit.
trans-unit.target: 可以容纳控件的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此成员重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性指示当用户按 TAB 键在窗体上控件接收焦点的顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控件都包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件，但是，并且不会收到焦点单独窗体的 tab 键顺序的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此属性是此类无意义。

trans-unit.source: The tab order of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabIndexChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理 TabIndexChanged 事件，以检测更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls are contained within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控件都包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>控件，并且不接收焦点单独窗体的 tab 键顺序的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: This property is therefore meaningless for this class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此属性是此类无意义。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the TabStopChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理 TabStopChanged 事件，以检测更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的选项卡上的文本。

trans-unit.source: Changing the Text property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: 更改文本属性值不会不自动居中的选项卡上的新值如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabSizeMode>属性值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: You can work around this limitation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or by removing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection and adding it back to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置来解决此限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性或通过删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合并将其添加回集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Both of these actions will automatically center the text.
trans-unit.target: 这两种操作将使文本自动居中。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the tab.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的选项卡上的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此选项卡的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: This tab page belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: 此选项卡页属于一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当用户的选项卡上移动鼠标，如果不显示工具提示文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.ShowToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ToolTips, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关工具提示的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for this tab.
trans-unit.target: 此选项卡的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含的值的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*> property.
trans-unit.target: 包含的值的字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref>后台时启用了可视样式，则使用当前的视觉样式呈现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background uses the current visual style only when the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景使用当前的视觉样式时，才 UseVisualStyleBackColor 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值都是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When the UseVisualStyleBackColor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property values are both `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当 UseVisualStyleBackColor 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值都是`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>属性的父级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl><xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>默认值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.RenderWithVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Child controls that you place on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 子控件，你将放置在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>继承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>默认情况下，因此此行为会导致背景的子控件的当前的视觉样式呈现的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property automatically sets the UseVisualStyleBackColor property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 更改的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性自动将 UseVisualStyleBackColor 属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> value that you specify, set the UseVisualStyleBackColor property after you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>背景以呈现使用可视样式，但你想要继承的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>设置后，你指定的值设置 UseVisualStyleBackColor 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>呈现使用当前的视觉样式; 背景否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不是对此控件有意义的。

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏选项卡中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，则必须将其删除从控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the VisibleChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理 VisibleChanged 事件，以检测更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a tab in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, you must remove it from the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏选项卡中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，则必须将其删除从控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
